entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
